twitter.text:
GPT-4.1 and GPT-4.1 mini underwent our standard safety evaluations. Detailed results are available in the newly launched Safety Evaluations Hub.

https://t.co/c8NgmXlC2Y

Plus, Pro, & Team users will be able to access GPT-4.1 via the "more models" dropdown in the model picker. Enterprise & Edu users will get access in the coming weeks.

We’re also introducing GPT-4.1 mini, replacing GPT-4o mini, in ChatGPT for all users.

https://t.co/Hiievyk7BT

By popular request, GPT-4.1 will be available directly in ChatGPT starting today.

GPT-4.1 is a specialized model that excels at coding tasks & instruction following. Because it’s faster, it’s a great alternative to OpenAI o3 & o4-mini for everyday coding needs.

Introducing the Safety Evaluations Hub—a resource to explore safety results for our models.

While system cards share safety metrics at launch, the Hub will be updated periodically as part of our efforts to communicate proactively about safety.
https://t.co/c8NgmXlC2Y
Rolled out now to all Plus, Team and Pro users with Enterprise and Edu coming soon.

You can now export your deep research reports as well-formatted PDFs—complete with tables, images, linked citations, and sources.

Just click the share icon and select 'Download as PDF.' It works for both new and past reports. https://t.co/kecIR4tEne

Evaluations are essential to understanding how models perform in health settings. 

HealthBench is a new evaluation benchmark, developed with input from 250+ physicians from around the world, now available in our GitHub repository.

https://t.co/s7tUTUu5d3
The new memory improvements are now fully rolled out to Plus and Pro users in the EEA, UK, Switzerland, Norway, Iceland, and Liechtenstein. https://t.co/O8lubCBNZO

rss.title: New AI and accessibility updates across Android, Chrome and more
rss.content: In honor of Global Accessibility Awareness Day, we’re excited to roll out new updates across Android and Chrome, plus new resources for the ecosystem.
rss.author: Angana Ghosh

rss.title: Helping startups build what’s next with the AI Futures Fund
rss.content: The AI Futures Fund is a new initiative from Google that invests in and works with startups.
rss.author: Jonathan Silber

rss.title: What you missed at our record-breaking GenAI Intensive course
rss.content: Google and Kaggle’s Gen AI Intensive course, had more than 280,000 signups in just 20 days.
rss.author: Anant Nawalgaria

rss.title: AI powers Expedia’s marketing evolution
rss.content: A conversation with Jochen Koedijk, Chief Marketing Officer of Expedia Group.
rss.author: OpenAI News

rss.title: Introducing HealthBench
rss.content: HealthBench is a new evaluation benchmark for AI in healthcare which evaluates models in realistic scenarios. Built with input from 250+ physicians, it aims to provide a shared standard for model performance and safety in health.
rss.author: OpenAI News
